cloogle.py
====================

Basic interfacing with the `Cloogle <https://cloogle.org>`_ API.

Links
-----
| PyPi: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/cloogle
| Source code: https://gitlab.com/cloogle/periphery/cloogle.py
